data.title: SonicWall MSS
data.meta_description: SonicWall MSS | 2,573 followers on LinkedIn. Never Alone. Relentless Security.  | SOLUTIONS GRANTED, INC. Now A Part of SonicWall,  is a completely MSP channel-focused Cyber Security Solutions provider. SGI provides comprehensive security solutions for MSPs to deliver to their customers with a dedicated team of US-based personnel and a 24/7 SOC delivered with a personal approach.
data.text:
People usually ask me how leadership can emphasize the importance of cybersecurity across all levels. The key is for everyone to act as a CRO, the Chief Repeating Officer. Make sure that the story is being told and repeated effectively so everybody understands the importance of what's at risk. Some of the qualities that make an effective cybersecurity leader are making wise and timely decisions, and making sure that you're not taking too long to decide since some decisions can have dire consequences if you take too long.

The SonicWall SonicWall MSS teams are headed to Toronto this week for another AMAZING The ASCII Group #ASCIIEDGE 😍 Michael E Crean, Julian Agapitos and Elizabeth Reynolds will be there in full force - We look forward to seeing you there! #roadwarriors #bettertogether #WeLoveASCII #NeverAlone #RelentlessSecurity #CyberExperts #MDR #SOCaaS #ThoughtLeadership #WeLoveMSPs

People usually ask me why small to medium businesses struggle with cybersecurity. It's often about limited resources and the need for solid processes. Put the right people in place and make sure that the processes are solid, well thought out, and executed. You have to make not just changes in your technology, but you have to change people's beliefs in how they will operate. Most importantly, everyone must believe that the change is their responsibility. #Cybersecurity #MSP #MSSP

People usually ask me about the challenges leaders face in conveying the seriousness of cybersecurity. Many business owners think, "I'm too small," or "I know what I'm doing." The truth is, no one is as effective alone as they are with a team. Collaboration and sharing have always been - and still are - key. As the Senior Vice President of Managed Security Services at SonicWall, our team is dedicated to helping you, our channel partners, help your clients sleep peacefully at night.
